I build and maintain relationships with technological professionals to help develop and enhance their businesses and careers.Account Management | Technical Recruiting | Interviewing | Business Development | Relationship Building As a technical recruiting manager at RHT, I place skilled technology professionals on a Direct-Hire, Full-Time Basis in the Greater Los Angeles Area. Specialties:Desktop Support | Network Administrators | Network Engineers | System Administrators | System Engineers | DevOps | Database Developers | Database Administrators | PHP - LAMP Web Developers | .Net Developers | Java Developers | iOS Developers | Android Developers | Product Managers | Business AnalystsContact me:danielle.abramov@rht.com or 310.209.6838

Robert Half Technology offers permanent placement, direct hire recruitment solutions to premier organizations worldwide that require technical expertise. Projects range from complex e-business and web development initiatives to enterprise wide application development and technical system support. The technology professionals we place include software developers, project managers, database specialists, networking and infrastructure specialists, and help desk support professionals.Our extensive knowledge of the technology marketplace and experienced, tenured staff allows us to respond to your special needs and requirements promptly. We currently have more than 100 locations worldwide.Manage a full cycle recruiting desk - whether a company or candidate, I specialize in both Application Development and Infrastructure.

Lead Configuration User Interface Analyst at Chrome River Technologies
July 19, 2017, Brian was a client of Danielle’s

I struggled finding the right position that matched my career aspirations. At times the process felt hopeless and was very stressful. I was told by a dear friend that they had an amazing experience using Robert Half Technology as their employment agency. I had the pleasure of working with Danielle Abramov at Robert Half, who promptly reached out to me after receiving my email. Danielle took the time to understand what work experience I had and where I aspired to take my career. With that information, she presented numerous job opportunities to me within a few days. Not only did Danielle help find me job positions that were in line with my career path but she also coached and guided me through the entire hiring process; from resume reviews to interview preps, Danielle made the entire process a breeze. Danielle truly provides her clients an amazing experience, one that made me feel as though I was always a top priority.It has been almost two months since I started working in the job position Danielle found me, and it is a perfect fit for me. I can truly say that contacting Robert Half Technology was the best decision I've made in a long time. If you are currently in the (tech) job market then do yourself a favor and contact Danielle Abramov at Robert Half Technology.Thank you for everything, Danielle!!!!!
